participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

ksads_odd_raw_1033_p.Description: Did your child sometimes do things to get back at people if they hurt them or made them mad? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1022_p.Description: Over the past two weeks; how often has your child done things on purpose to annoy other people? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_odd_raw_1023_p.Description: In the past two weeks; how often has your child blamed other people if he or she made a mistake or did something wrong? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_odd_raw_1025_p.Description: Do the things we've just been talking about cause problems for your child or other people in any of the following areas:With friends | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1026_p.Description: Do the things we've just been talking about cause problems for your child or other people in any of the following areas:With family | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1027_p.Description: Do the things we've just been talking about cause problems for your child or other people in any of the following areas:At school | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1028_p.Description: Do the things we've just been talking about cause problems for your child or other people in any of the following areas:At work | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1029_p.Description: Do the things we've just been talking about cause problems for your child or other people in any of the following areas:With any other activities | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1030_p.Description: How long has your child had any of the symptoms we've just talked about? Please enter weeks; months; or years

ksads_odd_raw_1031_p.Description: For these next questions; focus on December 2003 when your child argued with adults and disobeyed rules. Back then; did your child often feel annoyed? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1032_p.Description: Did your child often feel angry or resentful toward other people? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1021_p.Description: Over the past two weeks; how often has your child done something to get back at someone who hurt them or made them mad? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_odd_raw_1034_p.Description: Did your child sometimes do things on purpose to annoy other people? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1035_p.Description: Did your child blame other people if he or she made a mistake or did something wrong? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1037_p.Description: Did the things we've just been talking about cause problems for your child or other people back then in any of the following areas:With friends | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1038_p.Description: Did the things we've just been talking about cause problems for your child or other people back then in any of the following areas:With family | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1039_p.Description: Did the things we've just been talking about cause problems for your child or other people back then in any of the following areas:At school | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1040_p.Description: Did the things we've just been talking about cause problems for your child or other people back then in any of the following areas:At work | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1041_p.Description: Did the things we've just been talking about cause problems for your child or other people back then in any of the following areas:With any other activities | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1042_p.Description: How long did the things we've just talked about last back then? Please enter weeks; months; or years.

ksads_odd_raw_1043_p.Description: You reported that your child had the symptoms we've just talked about both currently and in the past. Was there ever a 6 month period since October 2013 when your child didn't have these symptoms? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_1020_p.Description: In the past two weeks; how often has your child felt angry at; or resentful toward other people? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_odd_raw_454_p.Description: In the past two weeks; how often did your child talk back to or argue with parents or teachers? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_odd_raw_455_p.Description: Was there ever a time that your child argued a lot with parents or teachers? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_456_p.Description: Was there ever another time that your child argued a lot with parents or teachers? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_457_p.Description: In the past two weeks; how often did your child refuse to do something a grown up asked him or her to do? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_odd_raw_458_p.Description: Was there ever a time that your child often refused to do the things grownups asked? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_459_p.Description: Was there ever another time that your child often refused to do the things grownups asked? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_odd_raw_460_p.Description: You said that in the past two weeks your child argued a lot with his or her parents or teachers. When did this begin?

ksads_odd_raw_461_p.Description: You said that in the past two weeks your child often refused to do the things grownups asked. When did this begin?

ksads_odd_raw_462_p.Description: You said that in the past two weeks your child argued a lot with parents or teachers and often refused to do the things grownups asked. When did this begin?

ksads_odd_raw_463_p.Description: You said that in the past your child argued a lot with parents or teachers. When was that? If this was true of your child for a very long time; let me know when it started and when it was the worst

ksads_odd_raw_464_p.Description: You said that in the past your child often refused to do the things grownups asked. When was that? If this was true of your child for a very long time; let me know when it started and when it was the worst.

ksads_odd_raw_465_p.Description: You said that in the past your child argued a lot with parents or teachers; and often refused to do the things grownups asked. When was that? If this was true of your child for a very long time; let me know when it started and when it was the worst

ksads_odd_raw_1019_p.Description: In the past two weeks; how often has your child felt annoyed? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day
